text: Don Wilson (1930 – 2003) was an English football player and manager, who played in the Football League for Bury. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Date of death missing Category:Place of death missing Category:Association football fullbacks Category:English footballers Category:Bury F.C. players Category:Mossley A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:English football managers Category:Mossley A.F.C. managers Category:Stalybridge Celtic F.C. managers Category:Radcliffe F.C. managers
